faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Quick answers to common questions about our services and processes

questions.question: What types of agricultural projects do you handle?
questions.answer: We specialize in greenhouse installations, cold storage solutions, IoT-based irrigation systems, solar power integration, and agricultural equipment import. We also provide consulting services for sustainable farming practices.

questions.question: How long does a typical project take to complete?
questions.answer: Project timelines vary depending on scope and complexity. Small installations typically take 2-4 weeks, while larger government contracts may take 3-6 months. We provide detailed timelines during the consultation phase.

questions.question: Do you provide maintenance and support services?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive maintenance packages for all our installations. This includes regular inspections, technical support, spare parts supply, and emergency repair services.

questions.question: Can you work with international clients?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We have experience with import/export operations and can work with international clients. We handle all necessary documentation and compliance requirements.

questions.question: What is your payment structure?
questions.answer: We typically work with a milestone-based payment structure: 30% advance, 40% during installation, and 30% upon completion. Payment terms can be customized based on project requirements.
